rest.description: used as background for rest state in main action objects

hover.description: used as background for hover state in main action objects

active.description: used as background for active/pressed state in main action objects

focus.description: used as background for focus state in main action objects

rest.description: used as background for rest state in secondary action objects

hover.description: used as background for hover state in secondary action objects

active.description: used as background for active state in secondary action objects

focus.description: used as background for focus state in secondary action objects

rest.description: used as background for rest state in tertiary action objects

hover.description: used as background for hover state in tertiary action objects

active.description: used as background for active state in tertiary action objects

focus.description: used as background for focus state in tertiary action objects

rest.description: used as background for rest state in inverted action objects

hover.description: used as background for hover state in inverted action objects

active.description: used as background for active state in inverted action objects

focus.description: used as background for focus state in inverted action objects

rest.description: used as background for disabled state all action objects or inputs

primary.description: used as main background for UI

secondary.description: used as secondary background for UI and popups

tertiary.description: used as subtle contrast background for UI

neutral.description: used as highlight background for UI elements

contrastInverted.description: used as background for inverted UI and objects

disabled.description: used as background for disabled UI elements

primary.description: used as main brand color where needed

secondary.description: used as positive brand color where needed

tertiary.description: used as negative brand color where needed

primary.description: used as background for action objects and borders to represent positive / success

secondary.description: used as secondary background for action objects and borders to represent positive / success

tertiary.description: used as subtle background for objects to represent positive / success

primary.description: used as background for action objects and borders to represent negative / error

secondary.description: used as secondary background for action objects and borders to represent negative / error

tertiary.description: used as subtle background for objects to represent negative / error

primary.description: used as background for action objects and borders to represent information

secondary.description: used as secondary background for action objects and borders to represent information

tertiary.description: used as background for objects to represent information

primary.description: used as background for action objects and borders to represent warning state

secondary.description: used as secondary background for action objects and borders to represent warning state

tertiary.description: used as background for objects to represent warning state

hover.description: used as background for hover state on interactive items in lists

active.description: used as background for pressed/active state on interactive items in lists

focus.description: used as background for focus state on interactive items in lists

primary.description: used as primary color for text

secondary.description: used as secondary color for text

tertiary.description: used as disabled color for text

contrast.description: used as color for text on contrasting backgrounds

inverted.description: used as color for text on inverted backgrounds

accent.description: used as color for accent text or links highlight

success.description: used for text in success messages

danger.description: used for text in negative / error messages

warning.description: used for text in warning messages

information.description: used for text in info messages

primary.description: used as main color for icons

secondary.description: used as secondary color for icons

tertiary.description: used as disabled or alternative color for icons

inverted.description: used as color for icons on inverted backgrounds

subtle.description: used for main border color in UI

bold.description: used for stronger border color in UI

custom.description: used for platform specific border color in UI

rest.description: used as border for rest state inputs

hover.description: used as border for hover state inputs

active.description: used as border for active/ pressed state inputs

focus.description: used as border for focus state inputs

disabled.description: used when no opacity should be applied when needed to be specified

loading.description: used for overlay fill backgrounds or  loading objects

xs.description: subtle elevation shadow for UI items and objects used on hover state

s.description: elevation shadow for objects like cards

l.description: stronger elevation shadow for dropdown objects

xl.description: used as shadow for popups and big pannels

inner.description: used as inner shadow where needed

body.description: used as main font for body text

title.description: used as main font for titles

extraLight.description: used to emphasis extra light weight text

xs.description: used for small size body text

s.description: used for small size body text

m.description: used for title size body text

l.description: used for subtitles and small titles

xxl.description: used for subtitles and main titles

negative.description: negative letter spacing used for titles when needed

neutral.description: regular letter spacing used in body and subtitles

positive.description: larger letter spacing used for small body text and captation

xxs.description: used for line height for captation

xs.description: used for extra small line height

s.description: used for line height for small body text

m.description: used for line height for body text

l.description: used for line height subtitle text

xl.description: used for line height for title text

xxl.description: used for line height for main titles

s.description: used after heading on page, titles for secondary pages

m.description: used as secondary heading on page

l.description: used as main heading on page

s.description: used as alternative subtitles for paragraphs

l.description: used as subtitles, group names and subheadings

s.description: used for subtle / alternative body text

l.description: used for bolder or title body text

none.description: use for 0 padding or item spacing where needed

xxs.description: used for small paddings and margins like in lists or items

xs.description: used for paddings and margins in small objects

s.description: used for small margins and paddings in objects like cards or normal buttons

m.description: used for medium margins and paddings where needed

l.description: used for large margins and paddings where needed

xl.description: used for extra large margins and paddings where needed

xxl.description: used for extra large margins and paddings in layout

s.description: use for medium icons size or small buttons

m.description: use for normal buttons or item rows

xl.description: use for large objects like fixed cards

none.description: used for straight corners with 0 roundness

s.description: used as main radius for action items and objects

m.description: used as alternative radius for action items and objects

l.description: used as radius for objects where needed

xl.description: used as strong radius for objects where needed

circular.description: used for tags or tag like objects with circular radius
